description: Patagonia's Line Logo Ridge Stripe graphic reminds us that we find ourselves in the mountains. We work to protect the places we love and conserving resources is part of that. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this hoody made with 100% recycled fabric reduces our reliance on virgin materials.
name: Patagonia Line Logo Ridge Stripe Uprisal Hoody - Unisex

specs.value: 11.5 oz 55% postconsumer recycled polyester, 45% recycled cotton knit fleece with a brushed back
